## Corals of Cleveland Bay
To be released in March 2024, the Corals of Cleveland Bay StoryMap will unveil the hidden world of coral reefs beneath the surface of Cleveland Bay.
:::



::: {.callout-tip}
## Hydrology and Hydrodynamics of Cleveland Bay

Released in November 2023, the Hydrology and Hydrodynamics of Cleveland Bay StoryMap focus on the movement of water in and around the Bay:

Rain comes in massive peaks and troughs, cyclones tear across the ocean, and winds and currents stir the coast into a swirling mix of salt, sand, and sediment. The <a href="https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/40fb1343dd8f4a8f9edc3b51e2346943" class="main-links"> Hydrology and Hydrodynamics of Cleveland Bay</a> story explores, from the very beginnings, the journey of water across Cleveland Bay: where it comes from, where it goes, what it does, and how it does it. It explores the impact of humans on water, what impacts are yet to come, and how we can best prepare for the future.
:::



::: {.callout-tip}
## Guardians of the Bay

Released in March 2022, the Guardians of the Bay StoryMap explores the importance of seagrass for our daily lives.

Seagrass, small plants with a big impact. The <a href="https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/1955ed7dd4c440639bb34f8a430aa054" class="main-links"> Guardians of the Bay </a> story explores how seagrass can stabilize the ocean floor, improve water quality, and protect our shores from erosion, it takes you on a journey under the ocean and into the flourishing world of seagrass in Cleveland Bay. 
:::
